Hi Community,

Could someone explain this error?

End goal: Connected HS to a third party so when a lifecycle stage or certain properties are updated it send this information to a third party which then makes a call back to HS to get more information from the contact

Problem: In a test environment during some final testing (in preparation for deployment on the live system) I found something strange.When making changes to a contact I receive a notification from HubSpot.Then I make a call to the HubSpot API to retrieve all the properties of the changed contact.

And now comes the weird part: I do NOT get the current values. Only after some time do I get the new values.

The call I use to get the contact is

<https://api.hubapi.com/contacts/v1/contact/vid/1/profile?propertyMode=value_only&formSubmissionMode=newest>


When I make the call through Postman I can see the new values directly.

Any idea what is going on here?


Do you have any idea what is going on? I already tried to add the Cache-Control=no-cache header, but that didn't make any difference.
